attributes.title: Advanced Computer Vision Systems
attributes.description: Developing next-generation computer vision systems using deep learning

attributes.title: Natural Language Understanding
attributes.description: Advanced NLP techniques for context-aware language understanding

attributes.title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning
attributes.description: Developing techniques for training models across distributed data sources while preserving privacy
objectives: Reduce communication overhead in federated systems
Enhance privacy guarantees beyond differential privacy

attributes.title: Quantum Approaches to Machine Learning
attributes.description: Exploring quantum computing advantages for select machine learning problems
objectives: Develop quantum algorithms for ML acceleration
Identify practical quantum advantage use cases

attributes.title: Adaptive Robotics Control
attributes.description: Developing reinforcement learning approaches for adaptive robot control in unstructured environments
objectives: Create sample-efficient RL algorithms for robotics
Implement transfer learning between simulation and real-world
Demonstrate robust performance in dynamic environments

attributes.title: Novel Approaches to Low-Light Computer Vision
attributes.abstract: This paper presents innovative techniques for computer vision in low-light conditions...

attributes.title: Context-Aware Language Understanding in Multi-Domain Settings
attributes.abstract: We propose a novel approach to context-aware language understanding...

attributes.title: Communication-Efficient Federated Learning with Adaptive Compression
attributes.abstract: This paper introduces a novel compression technique for federated learning that adaptively adjusts to network conditions and data heterogeneity...

attributes.title: Sim-to-Real Transfer for Robotic Manipulation via Adaptive Domain Randomization
attributes.abstract: We present a new approach to sim-to-real transfer learning for robotic manipulation tasks that leverages adaptive domain randomization...

attributes.title: Quantum Circuit Learning for Computer Vision Tasks
attributes.abstract: This study explores the application of parameterized quantum circuits for image classification tasks, demonstrating advantages in specific constrained scenarios...

attributes.title: A Comprehensive Survey of Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning Techniques
attributes.abstract: This survey provides a comprehensive overview of privacy-preserving machine learning techniques, including differential privacy, federated learning, secure multi-party computation, and homomorphic encryption...

;; Functions
(deffunction relationshipCount (?x) (length ?kb.relationships))

;; Rules
(defrule entity-attributes-rule
    "A rule to infer additional attributes for entities based on their type"
    (instance ?entity ?type)
    =>
    (if (eq ?type Person)
        then (assert (isAgent ?entity true))))

(forall (?x ?y)

        (well-adapted ?x ?y)))
